title: 04/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
As we approach the NFL draft Colin looks at the top quarterback prospects and why teams in the NFL have a much different view on players when compared to the NBA. He points out the biggest difference between Tom Brady and Aaron Rodgers and why Brady has had more success in the NFL. He also defends Lamar Jackson from the ridiculous criticism he receives despite his success in the league. Plus, former OL Geoff Schwartz joins the show in studio to breakdown the top lineman prospects and has serious questions about the 49ers taking Mac Jones at 3rd overall.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
